content:
I am a CNRS researcher in mathematics at the applied maths department of École Polytechnique in Palaiseau, France. I defended my thesis on the 11th of December, 2018.
I am also a part time teacher at École Polytechnique.
  Download my resumé.

title: Charles Bertucci
